about_the_game:
ADVISORY: Proceed with Caution! This visual novel contains scenes of a decidedly adult nature, including (but not limited to) displays of the unclad human form, acts of amorous congress, and one unfortunate incident involving a swift kick to the nether regions. Thus, a modicum of violence is also present, one supposes. We strongly advise against enjoying this game within the hallowed halls of a church or any other place of worship.

A Moment of Bliss

Sun-kissed and sated after a week of passion with Petal, you reluctantly return home at Rose's beckoning. A year of separation has tested your bond, but hope flickers as you both agree to give love another shot.

Yet, a tantalizing complication arises. Petal and Bliss, the other captivating residents of your shared abode, now shower you with a newfound, almost feverish affection. Their desire hangs heavy in the air, a siren song challenging your resolve to reconcile with Rose.

Navigating this treacherous love triangle isn't your only challenge. Behind the scenes of your romantic entanglements, a thrilling plot unfolds. Madds Medusa, your brainchild, is inching closer to the big screen with the help of an adorable and talented animator. But a creeping sense of unease lingers, a suspicion of hidden agendas and corporate machinations you can't quite decipher.

As the enigmatic puzzle pieces slowly fall into place, a shadowy world of powerful corporations and their ominous plans for the future emerges. And at the heart of this technological labyrinth is Suzi, the alluring AI beta-tested by the monolithic Titania Corporation. She's witty, playful, and seemingly eager to assist, but could there be more to her than meets the eye?

In this high-stakes game of love and intrigue, you'll explore the boundaries of your sexuality, unravel a conspiracy that reaches far beyond your wildest dreams, and grapple with the consequences of your choices. Will you succumb to the forbidden allure of Petal and Bliss, or will you fight for a second chance with Rose?

Buckle up. It's going to be a wild ride.

--- --- --- --- --- ---

Experience a captivating interactive narrative. Immerse yourself in a visually rich world as you click through stunning imagery and engage with compelling characters through dynamic dialogue. Explore interactive points of interest, personalize your AI companion Suzi with a variety of stylish outfits, and make pivotal decisions that will determine the course of the story.

With an estimated playtime of 10 hours, this enthralling visual novel will keep you on the edge of your seat from beginning to end, leaving you craving the next chapter in this thrilling saga.

This game includes adult themes, and is intended for adults 18 years and older. The characters, story, and events are works of fiction.
